message.content:
cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.CL, cs.NE 

The paper deals with active learning using Bayesian Neural Networks (BNNs) for large-scale visual classification and semantic segmentation tasks. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), followed by cs.CV (Computer Vision) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). The paper also involves natural language processing for semantic segmentation, which could place it in cs.CL (Computation and Language). Finally, the use of ensembles for approximation could also relate to cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing).
